unnormalised: The film festival circuit is buzzing! From Cannes to Kolkata, cinephiles are gearing up for a season of cinematic delights.
normalised: The film festival circuit is buzzing! From Cannes to Kolkata, cinephiles are gearing up for a season of cinematic delights.

unnormalised: Word on the street is that several Indian films are vying for recognition at international festivals, showcasing the diverse stories our country has to offer. And back home, preparations are in full swing for the upcoming "Kerala International Film Festival" (KIFF) in Thiruvananthapuram. Expect long queues and intense discussions over chai!
normalised: Word on the street is that several Indian films are vying for recognition at international festivals, showcasing the diverse stories our country has to offer. And back home, preparations are in full swing for the upcoming "Kerala International Film Festival" (K I F F) in Thiruvananthapuram. Expect long queues and intense discussions over chai!

unnormalised: Speaking of Kerala, this year, KIFF is rumored to be serving up some delicious Onam Sadhya to attendees – a culinary experience to complement the visual feast. After all, what’s a festival without some good food, right?
normalised: Speaking of Kerala, this year, K I F F is rumored to be serving up some delicious Onam Sadhya to attendees – a culinary experience to complement the visual feast. After all, what's a festival without some good food, right?

unnormalised: Meanwhile, smaller independent film festivals are popping up all over India, offering a platform for emerging filmmakers. The "Delhi Shorts Film Festival" continues to be a crowd-pleaser, showcasing innovative short films from across the globe. So grab your popcorn and your critical eye, because film festival season is officially here!
normalised: Meanwhile, smaller independent film festivals are popping up all over India, offering a platform for emerging filmmakers.
